${mod_id}.modmenu.title: §l${mod_name} Configuration
${mod_id}.modmenu.no_config_library_scre:
You need to install §6§lYet Another Config Lib [YACL]§f to open ${mod_name} Configuration Screen

§a§lOpen §6§lYACL §a§lModrinth page?
${mod_id}.modmenu.category.general.name: General
${mod_id}.modmenu.group.main.name: Main
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.mod_enabled.des: If enabled, you will see particles in your inventory from cursor with an item; if disabled, won't.
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.debug_mode_enab: If enabled, you will some debug info; if disabled, won't.
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.nbt_debug_mode_: If enabled, you will some debug info about item nbt in game logs; if disabled, won't.
${mod_id}.modmenu.group.particles.name: Particle Settings
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.cursor_spawn_en: If enabled, particles will be spawned around cursor (if any item was grabbed); if disabled, won't.
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.hovered_slot_sp: If enabled, particles will be spawned around the hovered slot; if disabled, won't.
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.gui_slots_spawn: If enabled, particles will be spawned around all slots in opened GUI; if disabled, won't.
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.gui_action_spaw: If enabled, particles will be spawned after some GUI actions (e.g. take/put items); if disabled, won't.
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.gui_action_take: If enabled, particles will be spawned when taking items from slots; if disabled, won't.
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.gui_action_put_: If enabled, particles will be spawned when putting items into slots; if disabled, won't.
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.particle_deleti: Controls which particles will be removed for spawn new particles if the maximum particle limit has been reached.
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.max_particles.d: Controls how many particles can exits on the screen.
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.particle_transp: Controls transparency of all particles on the screen.
${mod_id}.modmenu.group.coefficients.des: Particle spawn coefficients for different contexts.
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.global_count_co: Global multiplier for the count of particles that can be spawned. Applies additionally to all contexts.
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.global_cooldown: Global multiplier for the cooldown after particles spawn. Applies additionally to all contexts.
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.cursor_count_co: Multiplier for the count of particles that can be spawned around the cursor.
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.cursor_cooldown: Multiplier for the cooldown after particles spawn around the cursor.
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.hovered_slot_co: Multiplier for the count of particles that can be spawned on the hovered slot.
Multiplier for the cooldown after particles spawn on the hovered slot.
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.gui_slots_count: Multiplier for the count of particles that can be spawned around all slots in opened GUI;
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.gui_slots_coold: Multiplier for the cooldown after particles spawn around all slots in opened GUI;
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.gui_action_coun: Multiplier for the count of particles that can be spawned after some GUI actions (e.g. take/put).
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.gui_action_spaw: Chance (not cooldown) of particles spawning after some GUI actions (e.g. take/put).
